Parallels.ab: auui. gə̄uš. auui. gaiiehe. ~ Y68.30 nəmō gə̄uš nəmō gaiiehe

Ritual.ab: According to N53.36 this stanza has to be recited after the šnūman of Frawardīn at DrYt1.10 (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003: pp. 258-9):
xᵛarəθəm miiazdəm āiiese ẏeštitā xšnūmaine aṣ̌āunąm *frauuaṣ̌inąm tā aōxtō.nāmanō ẏazatahe. 2 bār auui.
"(He has to recite twice) xᵛarəθəm miiazdəm āiiese ẏešti until xšnūmaine aṣ̌āunąm *frauuaṣ̌inąm until aōxtō.nāmanō ẏazatahe (DrYt1.10) and then auui (beginning of VrS65.78)."
